Package gov.nasa.arc.mct.services.component

Provides additional interfaces and classes defining the MCT component model.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComponentProvider This interface can be implemented as an OSGI service to provide one or more components or views for existing components.
ComponentRegistry This interface provides administrative functionality for component types.
FeedManager This interface provides access for feed management.
MenuManager This interface provides access for menu management.
PolicyManager This interface provides access for policy management.
ProviderDelegate Provides an interface for providers to implement delegate methods.
ProviderDelegateService This interface provides access for provider delegate service.
SearchProvider Provides search capabilities to search for components.
StatusAreaWidgetRegistry This interface provides access for status area widget registry.
 

Class Summary
AbstractComponentProvider An abstract class that implements ComponentProvider.
AbstractProviderDelegate An abstract class that implements ProviderDelegate.
ComponentType Implements an OSGi service that is used to define Module 1-style plugin components.
ComponentTypeInfo This class describes an component type.
CreateWizardUI This class provides a wizard for setting up a customizable UI to take in necessary parameters to create an instance of a new component.
PluginStartupStatus Provides a status object for a plugin to report warning or error during MCT startup.
StatusAreaWidgetInfo Provides information for creating a status widget.
ViewInfo The ViewInfo class describes metadata about a view.
 

Enum Summary
PluginStartupStatus.Severity Defines the severity levels for this status.
ViewType A ViewType represents where the view is appropriate for usage within the platform.
 

Package gov.nasa.arc.mct.services.component Description

Provides additional interfaces and classes defining the MCT component model.
